TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionEditorSheet extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示自訂運算式的設計階段編輯器工作表。

span.span: Represents a design-time editor sheet for a custom expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂運算式編輯器工作表可讓開發人員在設計階段的自訂運算式設定屬性。A custom expression editor sheet lets a developer set properties on a custom expression at design-time. 使用運算式的字串，就可以設定控制項屬性的值運算式字串會評估運算式產生器的執行階段和設計階段運算式編輯器。Control property values can be set using expression strings; the expression strings are evaluated at run time by an expression builder and at design time by an expression editor. 當您瀏覽控制項設計階段屬性方格中的屬性，視覺化設計工具會顯示對話方塊以設定控制項屬性提供值的運算式。When you browse the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the value for a control property. 您可以選取清單運算式前置字元為基礎的運算式型別。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 當您從清單中選取運算式前置字元時，視覺化設計工具會使用相關聯和該類型的運算式語法為基礎的評估，並將轉換的運算式字串的物件。When you select an expression prefix from the list, the visual designer uses the associated and objects to evaluate and convert the expression string based on the syntax for that type of expression. 視覺化設計工具會使用運算式編輯器工作表屬性，提示您輸入一個或多個字串結合成自訂運算式字串。The visual designer uses expression editor sheet properties to prompt for one or more strings that combine into the custom expression string. 一般而言，若要在設計階段提供新的運算式型別，您定義的唯一運算式前置詞並提供自訂和實作。Typically, to supply a new expression type at design time, you define a unique expression prefix and provide custom and implementations. 或者，您可以在其中提供自訂實作，定義用來構成運算式的屬性。Optionally, you can provide a custom implementation that defines properties that are used to form the expression. 若要將運算式前置字元關聯的運算式產生器和一個運算式編輯器，適用於屬性和屬性設定為自訂類別，然後再設定運算式產生器中運算式前置字元`expressionBuilders` Web 組態檔中的項目。To associate an expression prefix with an expression builder and an expression editor, apply the attribute and an attribute to the custom class, and then configure the expression prefix for an expression builder in the `expressionBuilders` element in the Web configuration file. 預設實作方法會傳回基本編輯器工作表頁，會使用單一的輸入的字串來形成的運算式。The default implementation of the method returns a basic editor sheet, which uses a single input string to form the expression. 自訂運算式編輯器，衍生自可以覆寫方法傳回的自訂編輯器工作表的實作。Custom expression editors that are derived from the can override the method to return a custom editor sheet implementation. 一般而言，自訂編輯器工作表包含用來建置的運算式字串的多個屬性。Typically, a custom editor sheet contains multiple properties that are used to build the expression string. 方法會傳回產生根據目前的運算式屬性的運算式字串。The method returns the resulting expression string based on the current expression properties. 例如，類別衍生自類別，並提供用於評估和關聯的控制項屬性中的資源字串參考，在設計階段的實作。For example, the class derives from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating a resource string reference with a control property at design time. 類別是與運算式前置詞相關聯`Resources`而實作。The class is associated with the expression prefix `Resources` and the implementation. 方法會傳回，其定義的個別屬性，形成資源參考運算式。The method returns a , which defines the individual properties that form a resource reference expression. 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: - 方法傳回的自訂編輯器工作表的實作。The method to return a custom editor sheet implementation. - 建構函式來實作您的運算式編輯器工作表實作的自訂初始化動作。The constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression editor sheet implementation.

span.para: 衍生的自訂運算式編輯器工作表，從類別，如果您正在定義新的運算式類型的控制項屬性的值，而且您想要建置的運算式字串，根據多個運算式的屬性值。在衍生的類別實作應該包含下列:-每一個相異值的運算式字串中，可以在設計階段設定的公用屬性。 -實作form 編輯器工作表屬性值的自訂運算式字串的方法。 -（選擇性） 建構函式實作的工作表屬性會設定編輯器的初始值。相關聯的自訂運算式編輯器類別建立衍生的編輯器工作表中的執行個體方法，為控制項屬性，設定目前的運算式字串，初始化該執行個體，並傳回視覺化設計工具與執行個體。視覺化設計工具可讓您設定工作表屬性的運算式，然後呼叫方法，以形成輸入的運算式的工作表屬性值的運算式字串。

Derive a custom expression editor sheet from the class, if you are defining a new expression type for control property values and you want to build the expression string based on multiple expression property values. A derived class implementation should contain the following: - A public property for each distinct value in the expression string that can be set at design time. - An implementation of the method that forms the custom expression string from the editor sheet property values. - Optionally, a constructor implementation that sets the initial values of the editor sheet properties. The associated custom expression editor class creates an instance of the derived editor sheet in the method, initializes that instance with the current expression string set for the control property, and returns the instance to the visual designer. The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to form the expression string from the input expression sheet property values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立的執行個體直接使用建構函式。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of an directly using the constructor.

span.para: 當衍生自類別中覆寫建構函式來實作您的運算式編輯器工作表實作的自訂初始化動作。例如，自訂運算式編輯器工作表類別可實作其他的運算式屬性可以定義中的運算式屬性的預設值建構函式。自訂運算式編輯器工作表類別可以定義額外的公用建構函式的多載，可用於輸入的參數值設定運算式屬性的初始值。

When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression editor sheet implementation. For example, a custom expression editor sheet class that implements additional expression properties can define the default values for the expression properties in the constructor. A custom expression editor sheet class can define additional public constructor overloads that use input parameter values to set the initial values for the expression properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetExpression() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetExpression () As String

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回由運算式編輯器工作表屬性值構成的運算式字串。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the expression string that is formed by the expression editor sheet property values.

returns.span: 目前屬性值的自訂運算式字串。

span.span: The custom expression string for the current property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂運算式編輯器工作表包含多個合併，以組成的運算式字串的運算式屬性的設計階段設定。A custom expression editor sheet contains design-time settings for multiple expression properties, which are combined to form an expression string. 使用運算式的字串，就可以設定控制項屬性的值運算式產生器會在執行階段評估的運算式字串。Control property values can be set using expression strings; the expression strings are evaluated at run time by an expression builder. 方法會從目前的運算式屬性來傳回內建的運算式字串。The method returns an expression string that is built from the current expression properties. 視覺化設計工具可讓您設定工作表屬性的運算式，然後呼叫方法，以取得運算式字串，並設定控制項屬性值。The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to get the expression string and set the control property value.

span.para: 衍生的自訂運算式編輯器工作表，從類別，如果您正在定義新的運算式類型的控制項屬性的值，而且您想要建置的運算式字串，根據多個運算式的屬性值。在衍生的類別實作應該包含下列:-每一個相異值的運算式字串中，可以在設計階段設定的公用屬性。 -實作form 編輯器工作表屬性值的自訂運算式字串的方法。 -（選擇性） 建構函式實作的工作表屬性會設定編輯器的初始值。相關聯的自訂運算式編輯器類別建立衍生的編輯器工作表中的執行個體方法，使用該執行個體初始化為控制項屬性，設定目前的運算式字串，並再傳回至視覺效果的 執行個體設計工具。視覺化設計工具可讓您設定工作表屬性的運算式，然後呼叫方法，以形成輸入的運算式的工作表屬性值的運算式字串。

Derive a custom expression editor sheet from the class, if you are defining a new expression type for control property values and you want to build the expression string based on multiple expression property values. A derived class implementation should contain the following: - A public property for each distinct value in the expression string that can be set at design time. - An implementation of the method that forms the custom expression string from the editor sheet property values. - Optionally, a constructor implementation that sets the initial values of the editor sheet properties. The associated custom expression editor class creates an instance of the derived editor sheet in the method, initializes that instance with the current expression string set for the control property, and then returns the instance to the visual designer. The visual designer allows you to set the expression sheet properties, and then calls the method to form the expression string from the input expression sheet property values.

summary.span: 取得由運算式編輯器工作表使用的服務提供者實作。

span.span: Gets the service provider implementation that is used by the expression editor sheet.

value.span: ，通常由設計主應用程式提供，可用於取得其他的設計階段服務。

span.span: An , typically provided by the design host, that can be used to obtain additional design-time services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來設定實作自訂運算式編輯器工作表。Use the constructor to set the implementation for a custom expression editor sheet. 屬性可用來存取設計工具主應用程式所提供的服務。The property can be used to access services that are provided by the designer host. 例如，呼叫方法使用介面，以存取專案項目、 文件或提供視覺化設計工具的組態檔案詳細資料。For example, call the method with the interface to access project items, documents, or configuration file details that are provided through the visual designer.
